description: ff. 178. 258 x 178; 188 x 130 mm. 25 lin. 15th cen. (beginning and end by a later hand); on fol. 1a note by ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn Aḥmad al-ḥanafī, dat. Jumādá II, 1087. Brockelmann, GAL, II, 128 (no. 11); S II, 126 (no. 12). Vol. 2; incip.: ... ذکر هدىة صل ىالله علىه وسلم فى مکاتبته الى الملوك وغىرهم
author: Ibn Qayyim al-Jawzīyah, Muḥammad ibn Abī Bakr, 1292-1350

title.@value: Zād al-maʻād fī hady khayr al-ʻibād.

creator: Ibn Qayyim al-Jawzīyah, Muḥammad ibn Abī Bakr, 1292-1350
